{{i18nHL.paymentDetails.monthlyPayment}}
{{i18nHL.paymentDetails.principalInterest}} {{accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountPaymentInfo.principalAndInterestDueAmount | currency}}
{{i18nHL.paymentDetails.escrow}} {{accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountPaymentInfo.escrowDueAmount | currency}}
{{i18nHL.paymentDetails.mortgageInsurance}} {{accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountPaymentInfo.mortgageInsuranceDueAmount | currency}}
{{i18nHL.paymentDetails.subTotal}} {{accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountPaymentInfo.principalAndInterestDueAmount + accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountPaymentInfo.escrowDueAmount + accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountPaymentInfo.mortgageInsuranceDueAmount | currency}}
{{i18nHL.paymentDetails.otherCharges}}
{{i18nHL.paymentDetails.pastDue}} {{accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountBalanceInfo.pastDueAmount | currency}}
{{i18nHL.paymentDetails.lateFees}} {{accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountBalanceInfo.lateChargeBalance | currency}}
{{i18nHL.paymentDetails.unappliedFunds}} {{-accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountBalanceInfo.suspenseBalance | currency}}
{{i18nHL.paymentDetails.subTotal}} {{accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountBalanceInfo.lateChargeBalance +accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountBalanceInfo.pastDueAmount -accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountBalanceInfo.suspenseBalance| currency}}
{{accountDetails.mortgageAccount.loanAccountPaymentInfo.totalPaymentDueAmount | currency}}
